titles.title: Government Contact Act
To require each Federal agency to include its address and phone number on any agency stationery.
Government Contact Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

committee.subcommittee: Government Operations and the Federal Workforce

bill.summary: Government Contact Act - Requires each executive agency to include: (1) its address and phone number on any agency stationery; and (2) the address and phone number of the regional or local office on the stationery in the case of correspondence originating from such office. Provides for exceptions where compliance would not be in national security interests.
